kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Start Video Recording
kw.doc: Starts the recording of a video in the background with the specified ``name``. The recording can be stopped by calling the `Stop Video Recording` keyword.

kw.name: And Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Then Wait Until Element Is Enabled
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is enabled.

kw.name: And Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'scbeasy' into text field '//input[@placeholder = "พิมพ์สิ่งที่ต้องการค้นหา" and @name = "q"]'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Then Wait Until Element Is Enabled
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is enabled.

kw.name: And Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Then Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: And Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

kw.name: Stop Video Recording
kw.doc: Stops the video recording corresponding to the given ``alias`` and generates the file in WebM format. If no ``alias`` is specified, the last opened recording will be closed. If there are more recordings with the same alias all of them will be closed. If ``embed`` argument was set to ``True`` the video will be displayed in the log file. Furthermore, if the ``save_to_disk`` parameter is set to ``False``, the video will be embedded and available in the log file only.

kw.name: And Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

kw.name: Pause Video Recording
kw.doc: Temporarily stops the video recording corresponding to the given ``alias``. If no ``alias`` is specified the last started recording would be paused. If there are more recordings with the same alias all of them will be paused.

kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is enabled.

kw.name: Pause Video Recording
kw.doc: Temporarily stops the video recording corresponding to the given ``alias``. If no ``alias`` is specified the last started recording would be paused. If there are more recordings with the same alias all of them will be paused.

kw.name: Then Wait Until Element Is Enabled
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is enabled.

kw.name: And Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Then Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Resume Video Recording
kw.doc: Resumes the previous paused video recording corresponding to the given ``alias``. If no ``alias`` is specified the last paused recording would be resumed. If there are more recordings with the same alias all of them will be resumed.

kw.name: And Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

kw.name: Given Open Browser
kw.msg: The chromedriver version (133.0.6943.53) detected in PATH at C:\Phawat\chomedriverfortesting\chromedriver-win64\chromedriver.exe might not be compatible with the detected chrome version (134.0.6998.178); currently, chromedriver 134.0.6998.165 is recommended for chrome 134.*, so it is advised to delete the driver in PATH and retry

kw.name: Start Video Recording

kw.name: And Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Then Wait Until Element Is Enabled
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is enabled.

kw.name: And Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'scbeasy' into text field '//input[@placeholder = "พิมพ์สิ่งที่ต้องการค้นหา" and @name = "q"]'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Pause Video Recording
kw.doc: Temporarily stops the video recording corresponding to the given ``alias``. If no ``alias`` is specified the last started recording would be paused. If there are more recordings with the same alias all of them will be paused.

kw.name: Then Wait Until Element Is Enabled
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is enabled.

kw.name: And Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Then Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Resume Video Recording
kw.doc: Resumes the previous paused video recording corresponding to the given ``alias``. If no ``alias`` is specified the last paused recording would be resumed. If there are more recordings with the same alias all of them will be resumed.

kw.name: Stop Video Recording
kw.doc: Stops the video recording corresponding to the given ``alias`` and generates the file in WebM format. If no ``alias`` is specified, the last opened recording will be closed. If there are more recordings with the same alias all of them will be closed. If ``embed`` argument was set to ``True`` the video will be displayed in the log file. Furthermore, if the ``save_to_disk`` parameter is set to ``False``, the video will be embedded and available in the log file only.

kw.name: And Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
